description: Dive into "Whispers of Love in Hua Hin" ‚Äî a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Whispers of Love in Hua Hin

places.generalDescription: Cicada Market is a vibrant weekend night market in Hua Hin, offering a wide array of art, clothing, decor, and handmade goods from local vendors. It serves as a platform for artists, designers, and creators to connect with tourists and the community through cultural integration. The market features contemporary art in various forms including handmade decorative items, fashion clothes, secondhand items, and innovative SME products. Visitors can also enjoy creative activities such as workshops, exhibitions, performances, dance shows and music.

sources.snippet: Artistic Exploration at Cicada Market: The Cicada Market, open on weekends, is a vibrant hub for art and culture. This open-air market is not only a place to shop for unique handicrafts and art but also a space where you can immerse yourself in live music and performances. Walking through the market, hand-in-hand, exploring the colorful stalls, and perhaps picking up a handmade souvenir, adds a playful and cultural touch to your Valentine‚Äôs Day.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Around 3.5 km from the Hua Hin Night Market city-center, the Cicada Market is popular for handicraft items, exquisite delicacies, performing arts, beer garden, live music, street performances, and shopping options. This open-air market brings artists and other talents under one roof and winds the idea of freedom of expression. The market offers an enthralling experience to one and all.
sources.shortName: Top 21 BEST Things to do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Featuring handicrafts and local artists, some of whom can be seen at work, Cicada Market is also a great spot for an evening chill-out with beer gardens, a delicious food court and live music. Shopping at a night market is definitely something you shouldn‚Äôt miss among the things to do in Hua Hin.
sources.siteName: V Villas Hua Hin MGallery Collection
sources.shortName: 10 Best Things to Do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: The Cicada Market is a collection of handmade crafts, home furnishings, clothes, and appliances. It‚Äôs open every Friday-Saturday-Sunday from 4:00 PM ‚Äì 5:00 PM.
sources.siteName: M√∂venpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Best Things to do in Hua Hin 2025

sources.snippet: For a dose of art and culture, Cicada Night Market is where you want to be. By night, the lights are simply mesmerising.
sources.shortName: 25 out-of-the-ordinary things to do in Hua Hin and Petchaburi region

places.name: Cicada Market

reviews.text:
Great medium sized market with lots of different goodies for gifts for all ages.
Live music playing all night and in a different part a juggling act especially for the kids.
Lots of fantastic food stalls with something for everyone.
We had the crispy belly pork, coconut curry, crab fried rice and stir fried vegetables. All was delicious!
Looking forward to coming again tomorrow evening to try the fish and prawns! üòã

Whilst the experience buying food was lacklustre, the kind of shopping you can do at cicada market was really unique! Many skilled craftsmen selling their crafts which you can bring home. Live music and magic show was also very lively, overall still enjoyed ourselves here :)

The market offers a variety of performances, as well as art and food for sale (though the taste might be a bit bland for a Thai like me). If you want to buy food, exchange your coupon first. I also recommend the massage shop at the very back. The masseuses are very skilled. I felt so comfortable that I fell asleep during the massage.

places.address: 83, 159 ‡∏ã‡∏≠‡∏¢ ‡∏´‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ñ‡∏ô‡∏ô 21, Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Wat Huay Mongkol is a serene Buddhist temple complex located about 15 kilometers west of Hua Hin, Thailand. The highlight of the temple is its enormous statue of Luang Phor Thuad, a revered monk known for his enlightenment and miraculous powers. The statue, standing at 12 meters tall and 10 meters wide, sits atop a large mound and can be seen from afar. Visitors can climb the wide stairway to get closer to the impressive sculpture.

sources.snippet: This historic temple features one of the largest statues in the world, and several architectural features and stunning artworks. The statue depicts the famed Buddhist monk Luang Por Thuad who was said to have the ability to perform miracles. Couples staying at the Anantara Hua Hin can easily visit the iconic temple by making arrangements at the hotel.
sources.shortName: Romantic Places to Visit | Travel Plan with My Romantic Travel

sources.snippet: Amidst the Thai-style pavilion of teak trees is the world‚Äôs largest statue with a height of 12 meters and a width of 10 meters of Luang Phor Thuad in this Buddhist temple the Wat Huay Mongkol. The statue rises above the trees and can be seen from away as well. The statue is of a fabled monk known to perform miracles and his illustriousness.
sources.shortName: Top 21 BEST Things to do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Huay Mongkol Temple is known for its stunning statue of Luang Phor Thuad, a legendary Thai monk. The statue is one of the largest in Thailand, standing at a height of 12 meters. Many people visit the temple to pay their respects, make offerings, and seek blessings.
sources.siteName: M√∂venpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Best Things to do in Hua Hin 2025

sources.siteName: V Villas Hua Hin MGallery Collection
sources.shortName: 10 Best Things to Do in Hua Hin

places.name: Wat Huay Mongkol

reviews.text:
A little out of the way but the expansive grounds and number of shrines, statues, and gardens makes the trip worthwhile.
We went on a Sunday and quite a lot of people there.
Has a few cafes for food and coffee in nice shaded areas.
Lake is particularly nice and can release and feed fish. Some fish are huge, so dont release your little fish there üòÖ

Nice that foreigner tax not charged for entry

The atmosphere is very shady and peaceful. The sculptures are beautiful. There is a convenience store, a cafe, and a fish feeding point. (There are no public buses at this time. I recommend driving yourself. If you take a motorcycle or Grab, have the driver wait to take you back.)

We recently visited a truly exceptional temple in Thailand, and despite the considerable walking, we found the experience immensely rewarding. The temple's beauty and intricate details were captivating, and we highly recommend it to anyone seeking a culturally enriching experience.

places.address: ‡∏ó‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏´‡∏•‡∏ß‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏¢‡πÄ‡∏•‡∏Ç 3219, Thap Tai, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Pineapple Valley Golf Club Hua Hin is an 18-hole course designed by Thai golf architect Pirapon Namatra. Situated on a former pineapple plantation, the natural greens and scenic views make it a paradise for golfers. Surrounded by forested hills, the club offers stunning mountain and ocean views. Additionally, visitors can explore Hua Hin Hills Vineyard and enjoy award-winning Monsoon Valley wines.

sources.snippet: Banyan Golf Club: The golf course at Banyan Golf Club offers a picturesque sunset view, with the sun setting over the mountains, creating a beautiful, serene landscape.
sources.siteName: Hua Hin Today - Your Premier Source for News, Reports, Events, and Information in Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Discover romantic sunset spots for Valentine's Day in Hua Hin - Hua Hin Today

places.name: Pineapple Valley Golf Club Hua Hin

reviews.text:
Great course. Despite heavy rain, it was very enjoyable. Some long par 4's, and off the blues hard to reach in 2.
We hired a buggy and got an ice box and water.  No other Hua Hin course does that.
Changing rooms were nice and with space. They also had toiletries and nice showers.
The food and beverages were also good.

Pineapple Valley Golf Club ‚Äì Where My Slice Met Its Match

As a proud 12-handicapper (on paper-on-course performance may vary), I rolled into Pineapple Valley Golf Club with optimism, fresh golf balls, and just enough self-confidence to believe I might break 85. Spoiler alert: I did not.

First off, let's talk about the views. They're so good, I almost forgave myself for topping my first tee shot 40 yards into a bush. The course is carved beautifully into the Hua Hin hills, and while it's stunning, it's also sneakily designed to test every ounce of your mental stability-and your short game.

Fairways? Immaculate. Greens? Fast enough to make you question every life decision that led to a four-putt. The undulations here are no joke. I read one green like a novel‚Ä¶ and still ended up three feet short.

The layout is a perfect blend of ‚Äúwow‚Äù and ‚Äúwhy did I try that?‚Äù You've got elevated tee boxes that make you feel like Rory (until you actually hit), and water hazards that seem to be magnetically attracted to Pro V1s. I personally donated three.

The caddies are legends-equal parts golf whisperer, therapist, and comedian. Mine gave me a read on the 14th that was so good I sank the putt and briefly considered proposing.

All in all, Pineapple Valley is a must-play. It's beautiful, brutal, and blissful all at once. If you're a 12-handicap like me, expect a rollercoaster round filled with the full range of human emotions‚Ä¶ and maybe bring a backup glove for when yours gets sweaty from both nerves and humidity.

Would I play it again? In a heartbeat. Would I score better? Probably not. But at least I'd look good doing it.

Beautiful course in magnificent condition. The fairways are amazing. Greens were a little slow to some other courses in Hua Hin ( which is liked). Caddies were very good in our group, carts have GPS TV's in each cart and a nice Clubhouse overlooking the course. A  bit more expensive than some other courses in  Hua Hin but definitely worth it.

places.address: 101 ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏π‡πà‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 9 ‡∏ã‡∏≠‡∏¢ ‡∏´‡∏°‡∏π‡πà‡∏ö‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ô‡∏≤‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà 21, Thap Tai, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Hua Hin Beach is a popular destination along the Gulf of Thailand, offering clear waters and soft, powdery sand. It's known for its unmatched Thai hospitality and a wide range of exciting activities. The area is not as crowded as other tourist spots, making it perfect for a leisurely day by the sea. Visitors can enjoy water sports like kiteboarding and kitesurfing due to consistent winds. The beach also boasts lovely beachfront hotels with direct access or public areas for relaxation.

sources.snippet: Stretching from the town center to Khao Takiap Hua Hin Beach is a 4 km white sand strip fringing the Gulf of Thailand. Pony rides, banana boat rides, surfing, parasailing, wind sailing, and similar activities attract tourists from all over. It is still not an overly crowded beach like others, and it is a family-friendly place to have fun or simply sit on the deckchair under the umbrella, sipping coconut water, soaking the sun in and letting the fresh, clear water tickling your feet.
sources.shortName: Top 21 BEST Things to do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Horseback Riding Along the Beach: Begin your romantic exploration with a horseback ride along the pristine shores of Hua Hin Beach. This activity offers a perfect blend of adventure and intimacy. Whether you are experienced riders or trying it for the first time, the experience of riding together with the backdrop of the vast ocean and the gentle sea breeze is exhilarating.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: The most popular beach in Hua Hin is Hua Hin Beach, which stretches over five kilometers. The beach has a long history, and it was once the site of a royal residence. Today, it‚Äôs a perfect place for swimming, sunbathing, and enjoying the stunning scenery.
sources.siteName: M√∂venpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Best Things to do in Hua Hin 2025

sources.snippet: There are so many incredible beaches in Hua Hin for those searching for a romantic getaway in Thailand. The best Hua Hin beaches have incredible views, crystal clear water and sandy shorelines. Thailand is home to many incredible beaches!.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

sources.snippet: One of the best romantic spots in Hua Hin is the Hua Hin Beach, where couples can take long walks along the shoreline, watch the sunset, and enjoy a romantic picnic.
sources.shortName: Private Guided Tour In Romantic Places Of Hua Hin

places.name: Hua Hin Beach

reviews.text: Very nice beach with warm waters to swim. Small shops on the way to the beach. Kids and adults had a good time walking along the water and exploring small animals. There were plenty of horse-riding options available at a charge of 250-300 per horse.

Hua Hin Beach is a beautiful place to watch the sunrise. The beach faces east, so the sun rises directly over the sea. In the early morning, the sky changes color-orange, pink, and gold. The beach is quiet, with only a few people walking or monks collecting alms. The sand is soft, and the sound of waves is peaceful. It is a perfect time to relax and enjoy nature.

A good spot to see the sunrise is in front of Centara Grand Beach Resort. This area has rocks and coconut trees, making the view more special.  Another nice place is Khao Takiab Beach, which is quieter and has a clear view of the sunrise.  Ôøº Ôøº

If you visit Hua Hin, I recommend waking up early to see the sunrise. It is a peaceful and beautiful experience that you will remember.

Went here and it having food festival..

Berry crowded.. many food and drink stalls..

Music..

Water fountain and lights in the night..

I saw many family here also lovers..

Everyone relaxing and enjoying the views and vibes..

So happy to feel this beach with the festival

U can find temples and monkeys too

Aaaah elephant village too

places.address: Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Black Mountain Water Park in Hua Hin is a sprawling water recreation complex spread over 40,000 square meters, just 15 minutes from the town center. It offers an array of attractions including nine slides, a towering vertical slide tower, six pools (including a wave pool that creates the largest waves in Thailand), and a lazy river. The park also features dining facilities and operates with high safety standards and trained lifeguards.

sources.snippet: The families willing to spend their day with fun rides, wave pool, beach pool, water slides, and more the Black Mountain Water Park is the apt destination. Located opposite a golf course, the Black Mountain Water Park is a popularly growing tourist hot spot. Made with high quality, modern equipment, the park has a 17-meter high tower.
sources.shortName: Top 21 BEST Things to do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: For those seeking a more adventurous romantic experience, a visit to the Black Mountain Water Park, with its thrilling water slides and pools, is a must.
sources.shortName: Private Guided Tour In Romantic Places Of Hua Hin

places.name: Black Mountain Water Park

reviews.text: Good fun water place if you love laid on sun bed where's plenty of them available here!! Nice clean place with fresh air no smoker on sight during ours time there. Affordable price to entry book 1 day advance to save for food there. Wave pool is the fun part give them a try.

Perfect spot for a relaxed family day - kids loved the safe water rides, we enjoyed the peaceful vibe and good food. Just make sure to arrange a ride back in advance, as taxis aren't always eager to come here

We had a fantastic day out at the black mountain water park with our kids ages 11 and under. We went during the week so it was quiet with no waits for the rides. The park is a perfect size to feel relaxed and not frantic. There are lots of seating areas around the park. Also the restaurant is very well priced and the food is tasty. I recommend buying tickets online in advance as it is cheaper that way. Lockers are available free of charge with a 200baht deposit. Lastly, this place doesn't have the bigger rides or more thrill seeking rides like vana nava but there's more than enough to keep everyone happy. Oh and the wave pool was an absolute favourite.

places.address: 1, Hin Lek Fai, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Hua Hin Night Market is a vibrant and bustling traditional marketplace located in the heart of central Hua Hin. The market comes alive in the evening, offering a wide array of goods from souvenirs, clothing, and crafts to DVDs.

sources.snippet: It is a default tradition to shop when holidaying in a foreign land. The Hua Hin Night Market fits in the traveler‚Äôs chronology, starting with outdoor activities by the sea in the day and shopping at night. The market is situated just a short walk from the Hua Hin town center.
sources.shortName: Top 21 BEST Things to do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: The nightmarket is one of the more popular Hua Hin Thailand attractions. Selling everything from clothing to accessories, footwear, food, fresh seafood and more!. Be prepared to haggle for a bargain, as the prices are usually quite inflated.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

sources.snippet: The Hua Hin Night Market is a popular walking street that is open every day. It‚Äôs a great place to enjoy delicious local food and shop for souvenirs.
sources.siteName: M√∂venpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Best Things to do in Hua Hin 2025

places.name: Hua Hin Night Market

reviews.text: Hua Hin main night Market. Runs every night. Has many shops for local goods and clothes along side many food stands and stalls. Large variety of seafood restaurants cooking out front and then you can sit at the restaurant. Very close by it's connected by an alley to the Patio which is a small square with tables, food and music as well. It's great to walk around and enjoy the vibe and then stop to have a bite to eat here and there. Easy to get to as the green Baht bus ends at the market. They have everything from savory to sweet, pizza to ice cream. You will not leave hungry. We went several times during our stay and never ate the same thing twice!!!

This market is big and offers a lot. Lots of food and the prices are reasonable. I ate ribs and sticky rice for 100b which was tasty. The fried mussels for 50b with sauce was a tasty good deal. They also sell souvenirs and clothing. There are several table to sit and eat plus a few 7/11 around. Lots of fresh seafood available grilling of however you like. Recommended
Definitely a hot spot for tourists. Prices are a bit higher in the area but you can find all kinds of things here from food to souvenirs. It's not too crowded and food selections are decent.

places.address: ‡∏ã, Hua Hin 72, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Suan Son Pradipat Beach, located in Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan Province, is a pristine and secluded paradise offering a tranquil escape from bustling tourist spots. The beach spans over 2 kilometers and features clear, clean sea water and fine white sand ideal for relaxation, swimming, sunbathing, strolling or cycling.

sources.snippet: Located 10 kilometers south of Hua Hin, Suan Son Pradiphat Beach is a peaceful and quiet beach that is perfect for a relaxing day trip. It‚Äôs known for its crystal-clear waters and soft sand, and it‚Äôs a great place for swimming and snorkeling.
sources.siteName: M√∂venpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Best Things to do in Hua Hin 2025

places.name: Suan Son Pradipat Beach

reviews.text:
Nice calm beach with not that many people. Easy and cheap to rent a sun chair.
Restaurants and food market near by. Also toilets and restrooms. Super nice place

Nice clean beach. A few mins walk from the station. You can take an excursion train from Bangkok. You can buy tickets in advance.
There are limited vegan options in the food court. Keep cash as this is no different from most places in Thailand. The toilets abs showers could have been better given that they charge 15 baht for shower and 5 for the toilet.

PS: I hope it doesn't get too popular like Pattaya with too many irritating Indians from my country with no manners. I went here to escape them ans have not told people about this place. Lol!

This is a nice little beach popular with Thais. Businesses are run by military families so everything is cheap, clean and good value. There are toilets, parking, good vendors, open air food court and deck chairs for rent. The beach is clean and not many dogs around. Bungalows with 2 to 3 bedrooms back off the beach can be rented for 2000 to 4000 baht. There's  also a whale skeleton to see. Updated 11/12/21 pretty much the same as last time.

places.address: Phet Kasem Rd, Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Oceanside Beach Club & Restaurant is a delightful dining destination located in Hua Hin, offering a chic seaside escape with its luxurious retreat. The restaurant is part of a beautiful Greek-style accommodation near Bangkok and provides timeless elegance at the Hua Hin Marriott Resort & Spa. It shares the location of great Isaan restaurants and offers cozy elegance at Le Cerestle Cafe. Visitors can also enjoy chill seaside cafes and memorable 2-day beach trips in the area.

sources.snippet: The Ocean Beach Club is the best Hua Hin nightlife with awesome vibes. Party into the night with cocktails by the pool or chill out in the cabanas for a little romance. There‚Äôs a DJ pumping the best tunes and they have awesome parties on the weekends.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

places.name: Oceanside beach club & restaurant

reviews.text: The perfect place to spend the day, take in scenic views of the ocean and beach, have a swim in the pool and eat some amazing food! John was looking after us and he was fantastic. Attention to detail and comfort from all staff. Highly recommended to unwind and relax.

The food is delicious, and the view is great. However, it gets very windy, and since there are no glass windows, lightweight items on the table can easily fly away. At the seaside tables, you might even get a little splash of seawater.

It's the perfect spot for a quick drink and some photos.

We visited the restaurant for dinner August 2025.

Nice restaurant in the Hilton complex. Hard Rock restaurant is also going to open in the same place so maybe everything here will become Hard Rock?

Nice and large menu. The food is quite ok, but you can get better food elsewhere for a lower price.

The negative here is that you have to walk a very long way to use the toilets.

The drinks are good and provide good value especially during happy hour.

I probably wouldn't go here again for the food, but I could have had a drink or two here again.

places.address: 22/65 Naeb Kaehat Rd, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the heart of Hua Hin, Lido is a charming Italian restaurant that caters to food lovers from breakfast through dinner. This delightful eatery offers a serene atmosphere that evolves into an intimate dining experience as night falls. With a focus on locally sourced seafood, meats, and seasonal produce, guests can indulge in exquisite dishes complemented by craft cocktails and an impressive wine selection.

sources.snippet: Lido: Lido is a quaint caf√© that stands out for its vintage charm and laid-back ambiance. Known for its excellent coffee and a selection of delectable pastries, Lido also offers a variety of light lunch options, including sandwiches and salads. It's an ideal spot for a leisurely lunch, especially if you‚Äôre looking for a quiet place to unwind.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: Lido

reviews.text: A stylish seaside spot with a breezy charm. For mains, we went with vegetarian pastas. Both good, but the gnocchi was the highlight, perfectly pillowy, rich but not over the top. The crowd leaned family-friendly when we visited, so if that's not your scene, snagging an outdoor table might be the way to go.

The interior of this restaurant is very nice with indoor and outdoor seating. Blue crab salad and lido fries were good. Beef and chicken okay in taste but not very special.

We had to wait a very long time for our food and it was not busy in the restaurant at all (four customers).

Service was friendly
Nice location near the beach at the Standard hotel.   The food is good.  The service could be better as the night we were there the servers were either over committed or missing in action.

places.address: 59 Naresdamri Rd, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Praca, located in Hua Hin, is a stylish and trendy dining spot known for its fusion cuisine that combines Thai and international flavors. The restaurant offers a unique and memorable dining experience with its innovative menu and chic decor. Additionally, Praca hosts an Afternoon Tea every Friday, Saturday, and Sunday from 3 PM to 5 PM.

sources.snippet: Pra√ßa: Pra√ßa is a trendy, modern dining establishment in Hua Hin known for its fusion cuisine. The restaurant offers a creative blend of Thai and international flavors, served in a contemporary and stylish setting. With its innovative menu and chic decor, Pra√ßa provides a dining experience that‚Äôs both unique and memorable.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: Pra√ßa

reviews.text:
An amazing restaurant right on the water inside The Standard Hotel.
The server recommended a package for 2 people with 7 dishes and 4 drinks and we loved it.
The quality of the food was amazing.
2000 THB for 2 people, including the 4 cocktails.
For a fancy place with western standards for service, and very fancy drinks and food, the value was pretty good.
Would recommend.

The food here was just exceptional. Thai fusion done incredibly well. I can understand why it's Hua Hin's top rated restaurant.
Food, delicious.
Service, attentive.
Atmosphere, peaceful.

Do come here for a romantic dinner out which comprises of Thai foods best flavours mixed with modern marketability and service.

Loved the food here.  Thai fusion so don't expect tradition! The beef fried rice bowl was superb.  Also loved the shrimp salad.  Lovely dinner indeed. Service also good. Got a nice cocktail shot - spicy üòõ

places.address: 59 Naresdamri Rd, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled along the stunning coastline of Hua Hin, MATAPITA.TEA is a charming seaside caf√© that invites you to unwind and soak in the serene atmosphere. With its sandy beach just steps away, you can enjoy the gentle sea breeze while sipping on a refreshing cup of tea or coffee paired with delectable pastries. The caf√©'s inviting ambiance makes it an ideal spot for indulging in their delightful Afternoon Tea set, featuring an array of sweet treats and hot beverages. MATAPITA.

sources.snippet: MataPita: MataPita is a cozy and inviting cafe known for its delightful fusion of Mediterranean and Thai cuisines. Located in the heart of Hua Hin, this charming spot offers a relaxed atmosphere with a menu that includes fresh salads, savory sandwiches, and a variety of vegetarian options. It's perfect for a casual, health-conscious lunch.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: MATAPITA.TEA

reviews.text: What a pleasant surprise! Sit and watch the ocean and eat your breakfast and coffee on comfortable chairs and off fine China! We loved it, came back the next day too! Coffee was fabulous as was our meals. I can not recommend it enough!

Nice place with beautiful decorations. We are impressive by the plates and tissues here.
Price is acceptable to have time to sightseeing and relax.
Notes: just open to 7pm, the alley to cafe is so dark if got late.
This place you gonna see the sunrise, not sunset.

8/10

Pros: Location was exquisite, a nice view and breeze from the beach. Unique take on simple tea and coffee concoction which makes it worthwhile beside the view. Presentation of food and drink was also cute. Cake we had (pomegranate cheesecake is also nice)

Cons:a little expensive for Thailand price, prepare by cash or scan only, no card payment.

places.address: 31 Naebkehardt Rd, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Immerse yourself in the world of Thai cuisine at the Hua Hin Thai Cooking Academy. Join a cooking class where you'll start by visiting a local market to handpick fresh ingredients, gaining an authentic insight into Thai food culture. Whether you opt for a half-day or full-day class, you'll have the opportunity to whip up five or ten dishes, with a vegetarian option available. The experience is suitable for both adults and children, as the chef provides guidance and printed recipes to take home.

sources.snippet: Thai Cooking Class: Start your culinary adventure with a hands-on experience. Participate in a Thai cooking class, where you and your partner can learn the art of Thai cuisine. These classes often begin with a visit to the local market to select fresh ingredients, offering an authentic glimpse into Thai food culture.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: Hua Hin Thai Cooking Academy

reviews.text: We had an amazing cooking class! Super friendly instructur that speaks very good English, explains clearly and gives really good suggestions for alternative available vegetables/ingredients at home. All well organized & clean. The food was delicious!!

Ya, the chef instructor, is a great teacher and gives all the knowledge you need to know to prepare Thai cuisine at home. She even educates on substitutions in case you can not find certain ingredients in your country. The morning class comes with a market tour to purchase ingredients. We took a private class‚Ä¶ taxi picked us up from our condo and took us to the market to met Ya. After the market took taxi to school. She a lot of dishes to choose from so you can try a variety. We did Green Curry Chicken, pandan leaf wrapped chicken, and coconut pancake. Had a great time and learned a lot about Thai cuisine. Would love to return for another class.

I've lived in Bangkok for over 2 decades and took a visiting friend here. I'm not a natural or passionate cook, but our teacher Khun Ya was excellent and very clear in detailing the ingredients and processes, as well as answering any questions we had (and not be new to the area I asked some more historical ones :)). My friend from the UK loved it. And there was a great choice of dishes to cook. So thank you, very much for a quality experience and some excellent food!

places.address: 210/4 Phetkasem Rd., Soi 82, Hua Hin, 77110, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Gallery Drip Coffee Hua Hin is a popular spot known for its excellent coffee and cozy atmosphere. The cafe offers a variety of high-quality brews, including northern Thai organic and Ethiopian Yirgacheff prepared using the hand-held drip method. It's a favorite among young artistic locals and visitors alike, with both indoor and outdoor seating available. Despite being crowded at times, the cafe's reputation for great espresso-based drinks and signature blends draws in coffee enthusiasts from near and far.

sources.shortName: Private Guided Tour In Romantic Places Of Hua Hin

places.name: Gallery Drip Coffee Hua Hin

reviews.text:
If you're a coffee lover, Gallery Drip Hua Hin is an absolute must-visit. This place takes coffee seriously, and it shows in every cup.

The Coffee
Their single-origin pour-over is next level. You can really taste the effort and precision that goes into each brew. The aroma is intoxicating, and the flavor? Balanced, smooth, and bursting with unique notes depending on the beans you choose. They've got an impressive selection of beans, both local Thai and international, so there's something for every palate. Whether you're a seasoned coffee geek or just starting your specialty coffee journey, you're in for a treat.

The Vibes
The caf√© has this chill, artsy vibe that's perfect for relaxing or getting inspired. It's a blend of cozy and creative, with a subtle gallery-like feel. You can tell this spot is run by people who truly love coffee and want to share that passion with everyone who walks in.

If you're in Hua Hin and craving a standout coffee experience, Gallery Drip Hua Hin delivers big time.

A lovely coffee shop with great coffee and cozy vibes. There are both indoor and outdoor seating areas, plus a variety of coffee beans to choose from. They also offer signature drinks, non-coffee options, and classic coffee menus. Highly recommended is the ‚ÄòBobbie Lemon' - a refreshing honey lemon soda with a shot of espresso, perfect to brighten up your morning!

I really like to have breakfast in this coffee shop, the food is tasty and well seasoned. Also the star of their menu the ‚Äúsalmon grilled sandwich‚Äù

The owner is really friendly and always smiley and being polite. Every staff here does their best at their job. I recommend it if you want to work as well üíª

places.address: 29, 9 Soi 51 Naeb Kehardt Road, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Vana Nava Sky is a high-end bar located on the 27th floor of the Holiday Inn in Hua Hin, Thailand. It specialises in international cuisine, and offers stunning views of the city from its glass sky deck.

sources.snippet: VanaNava Sky: VanaNava Sky is an iconic sky bar and restaurant located at the Holiday Inn Vana Nava Hua Hin. Offering panoramic views of the city and the ocean, this rooftop venue is known for its stylish design and vibrant atmosphere. It's a popular spot for enjoying cocktails at sunset, and it also offers a menu of international and Asian fusion dishes.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Vana Nava Sky: As the highest rooftop in Hua Hin, Vana Nava Sky provides a spectacular, expansive view of the sunset. The panoramic vista of Hua Hin from this vantage point is simply breathtaking.
sources.siteName: Hua Hin Today - Your Premier Source for News, Reports, Events, and Information in Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Discover romantic sunset spots for Valentine's Day in Hua Hin - Hua Hin Today

places.name: THE SKY HUA HIN

reviews.text: Perched atop the Holiday Inn Hotel in Hua Hin, the Sky Bar boasts an observation deck with a glass-floor section, providing awe-inspiring panoramic views of the sunset. Visitors should note the breezy conditions at this elevated spot-securing hats and lightweight accessories is wise to avoid losing them to the wind. Ideal for both social gatherings and relaxed moments, the venue invites guests to savor crafted drinks while immersing themselves in the stunning coastal scenery. A must-visit destination for sunset enthusiasts and those seeking a memorable ambiance.

I recently had the pleasure of dining at this exquisite restaurant located within floor 27 in a hotel, and it was truly a memorable experience. The food was outstanding-every dish was crafted with precision and packed with flavor. The restaurant maintains impeccable cleanliness, and the service was top-notch, with staff who were attentive, friendly, and professional.

One of the highlights of my meal was a steak and beef dish, which was perfectly cooked, juicy, and full of rich flavors. Another must-try is their pizza, made with high-quality ingredients and a deliciously crispy crust.

Adding to the experience, there is a bar conveniently located on the same floor, making it easy to enjoy a drink before or after your meal. Whether you're looking for a fine dining experience or just a great place to relax with good food and drinks, this restaurant is definitely worth a visit!

This Holiday Inn is probably the tallest hotel in the area‚Ä¶ The sky bar on the top is great kind of circular design many terraces with incredible views and the famous glass floor. You can walk onto definitely worth checking it out!

places.address: 129, 129 Phet Kasem Rd, Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Pasadena's newest luxury resort has a seafood focused restaurant that offers charcoal grilled local seafood as well as slow-roasted meats like the 20-hour cooked Australian wagyu short ribs. The restaurant also features iced seafood towers and Thai style green seafood sauce which can be ordered indoors or outdoors. There is both indoor and outdoor seating that get views of the beach.

sources.snippet: Big Fish: Located within the Hua Hin Marriott Resort, Big Fish is a sophisticated beachfront restaurant offering stunning ocean views. It specializes in fresh seafood and fine dining, with dishes expertly prepared and presented. The elegant atmosphere, combined with the sound of the waves, makes Big Fish an ideal choice for a romantic dinner or a special night out.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: Big Fish & Bar

reviews.text: My second visit to this restaurant, this time as a hotel guest. Service and food were great both times. Fresh french raw oysters were delicious. Burrata was top notch. Highly recommend if youre looking for fine dining experience with an ocean view.

We had a delightful dining experience with our six-year-old daughter at Big Fish and Bar. We started with the cauliflower soup, which was big enough to split and quite tasty. We also shared two entrees. The tenderloin Rossini style was cooked perfectly - medium rare - and served with a rich and flavorful red wine sauce. The yellow tuna tataki was fresh and the portion significant, making it more than enough for an entree. Our servers, Bow and Por, went way out of their way to make our kiddo feel catered to and cared for, which of course makes any parents day. We'll be back again for sure. Thank you for the nice evening.

My wife and I stumbled upon this gem on a whim, and it was a delightful surprise. The food was exceptional ‚Äì I savored a tender steak, while my wife enjoyed a flavorful Thai seafood curry. The restaurant's tranquil setting within the hotel grounds, surrounded by an enormous and impressive swimming pool, added to the ambiance. Overall, it was a fantastic dining experience that I'll definitely repeat. I would've taken more pictures of the meal but I completely forgot.

places.address: Marriott Resort & Spa, 107/1 Phet Kasem Rd, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled in the picturesque Hua Hin Hills, Monsoon Valley Vineyard is a surprising gem in Thailand's wine scene. Formerly known as Hua Hin Hills, this vineyard produces new latitude wines, defying traditional norms. The lush tropical paradise of Hua Hin Hills provides a stunning backdrop for over 250 acres of vineyards.

sources.snippet: Wine Tasting at Monsoon Valley Vineyard: Venture a little outside the town to the Hua Hin Hills Vineyard. This picturesque vineyard, set against the backdrop of rolling hills, is a romantic getaway for wine enthusiasts. Take a tour of the vineyard, learn about wine-making in tropical climates, and sample their unique range of wines.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Another romantic adventure couples can enjoy is a visit to this popular vineyard and taste award-winning wines. The Vineyard thrives by taking advantage of its location and climate to produce high-quality grapes and wine. The taste of wine paired with the vineyard‚Äôs picturesque surroundings make for a truly unique experience.
sources.shortName: Romantic Places to Visit | Travel Plan with My Romantic Travel

sources.snippet: The slate and loamy-sand terrain of these vineyards combined with the consistent ocean breeze enables several varieties of international grapes to grow and thrive. You can take a guided tour of the vineyard while learning how grapevines grow in a tropical climate. Your package includes:
sources.shortName: Romantic Resort In Hua Hin

places.name: Monsoon Valley Vineyard

reviews.text: We fully enjoyed this vineyard trip! Starting from walking around the vineyard, we had a big rain shower to be soaking during our walk, but it was a great memory for us. The tapas and wine tasting experience was beyond amazing. Under viewing down the vineyard trip, we enjoyed 5 marriages between the dish and the pairing wine. I strongly recommend this experience for wine and food lovers, this is the must to do in Hua hin!

Food was fresh and tasty. Had the wine and tapas tasting. Definitely worth it. The ambience is cooling and different as there are not many vineyards in thailand. Staff was attentive and friendly.

Maybe you could have a bigger play area for the kids and have a wine tasting fee that allows customers to taste any wine they choose to.

I enjoyed my experience here. Affordable food and the wine tasting was great. Just unfortunate the weather was bad so couldn't go for a vineyard tour. The service is great and they are quite friendly staff too. Clean and beautiful

places.address: 1 Moo 9 Baankhok Chang Patana, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Khao Kalok, also known as Skull Mountain, is a picturesque hill overlooking a secluded sandy beach in Pranburi. The soft white sands of Haad Khao Kalok are complemented by the rugged hill that gives the area its name. Visitors can take a steep hike up the hill for stunning views over the beach and surrounding scenery. Along the way, you'll pass local fishing communities and serene seaside scenes.

sources.snippet: You will enjoy a tuk-tuk as you travel the few minutes from the resort to Khao Kalok Hill. The climb to the top is short and leads to an exclusive viewpoint overlooking the majestic Pranburi forest. The only way you can enjoy this intimate and romantic experience is through the Aleenta Resort.
sources.shortName: Romantic Resort In Hua Hin

places.name: Khao Kalok

reviews.text: Easy trail to Khao Kalok viewpoint

Khao KaLok Viewpoint.
Take only 10 minute to the top.

3 JUN 2025

I saw this beach from TikTok ,it's took my mind to go there haha me and my boyfriend went there in June.Let me share my experience,this beach is exist in Pranburi City and near with Hua Hin ( 30mins drive ).It's difficult to go from Pranburi bus station because there is no taxi to take that beach So if you want to go there I want to recommend to rent bike or car from Hua Hin it's better more.When you arrive this beach you should try hiking to go secret ( khung sai beach ) it's worth it.And there were not much people at khao kalok beach it's so quiet I love it.i will come next time for sureüëçüèª

places.address: Pak Nam Pran, Pran Buri District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77120, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Pran Buri Dam is a picturesque earth dam that creates a vast reservoir by blocking the Pranburi River. Spanning 1,500 meters, it offers breathtaking natural surroundings and leisure opportunities such as walking and cycling with panoramic views. The area is tranquil, attracting few visitors except for local fishermen. It's ideal for activities like paddle boarding and enjoying the water. Access points around the lake allow entry for water-based activities.

sources.snippet: Pranburi Dam: Offering a beautiful landscape view, the sunset over Pranburi Dam, set against a mountainous backdrop, is a sight to behold. The dam‚Äôs serene environment makes it an ideal spot for couples seeking a peaceful retreat.
sources.siteName: Hua Hin Today - Your Premier Source for News, Reports, Events, and Information in Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Discover romantic sunset spots for Valentine's Day in Hua Hin - Hua Hin Today

places.name: Pran Buri Dam

reviews.text: Took a 2-hour drive from Hua Hin to Pranburi Dam Lake via Taweekarn Farm, Pala U. A beautifully scenic drive up the 3218 road before turning off to Tawekarn Farm for a very pleasant lunch break at their wonderful restaurant.  From there, we took the back dirt road through the mountains to the backside of the lake. I was in an old Vios saloon, and the road presented no problems. Amazing mountain views equal to those at the border on Suan Peung. 11 am thu 4.30 pm ... a very pleasant Sunday jaunt.
On one of the banks of this reservoir there's a big uninhabited ground where you can stop by on your RV or car or bike.  The view is scenic.
Great ride up to the dam then beautiful views and quite and peaceful ‚úåÔ∏è

places.address: ‡∏µ, Tambon Khao Chao, Pran Buri District, Chang Wat Prachuap Khiri Khan 77120, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Pranburi Beach is a tranquil sandy beach located just south of Hua Hin. It offers a pedestrian bridge with information about the nearby mangrove forest. In November, visitors can witness the exhilarating dragon boat racing on Pranburi River, where teams compete after months of practice. The beach is known for its fresh seafood and is a great spot for longboat hire to explore Mae Nam Pranburi and its surroundings.

sources.snippet: Pranburi Beach is located 30km south of the main Hua Hin beaches. Here you will find pristine Hua Hin beaches, clear ocean, charming villages and a few eco-friendly attractions. Some of the most incredible Hua Hin hotels on the beachfront perfect for honeymooners.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

places.name: Pranburi Beach

reviews.text: It's a very calm nice beach. Very good for relaxation and meditation üßò‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

This review will cover the Pranburi park, mangrove forest and one hour of sights I saw when rented bicycle.
1. Mangrove forest board walk.
2. Cross a structurally unsound bridge.
3.& 4. Cycle by several fish processing places
5. Boats in drydock being repaired
6. Pirate ship tour leaving harbour.
Long stretch of beach without any obstructions. Nice and windy

places.address: Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Wat Khao Takiap, also known as the 'Temple on the Hill,' is a tranquil Buddhist temple situated just outside Hua Hin, Thailand. It features a lengthy stairway leading to a vibrant shrine and offers picturesque views of the sea. The temple is perched atop a hill and provides breathtaking panoramic vistas of the coastline and its surroundings. At the summit, visitors are welcomed by a majestic golden Buddha statue overlooking the sea, representing tranquility and safety.

sources.snippet: This temple is located halfway up a mountain called Chopstick Mountain, also known as Monkey Mountain as it is frequented by macaque monkeys. The temple itself offers fantastic panoramic views of the ocean and a 20-metre-tall statue of a golden Buddha that overlooks the sea. However, getting to the temple requires you to climb the 80 steps after which you‚Äôll be rewarded with scenic views.
sources.shortName: Romantic Places to Visit | Travel Plan with My Romantic Travel

sources.snippet: Wat Khao Takiab: This temple, situated on a mountain, provides a tranquil setting to watch the sunset. Overlooking Khao Takiab Beach, the changing colors of the sky here are a natural wonder.
sources.siteName: Hua Hin Today - Your Premier Source for News, Reports, Events, and Information in Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Discover romantic sunset spots for Valentine's Day in Hua Hin - Hua Hin Today
25 out-of-the-ordinary things to do in Hua Hin and Petchaburi region

places.name: Wat Khao Takiap

reviews.text: There is some unusual quietness: a lot of birds are flying over the top of the hill but they are almost completely soundless which creates a feeling of something unreal: they fly in masses over the head but with no any air sliding sounds or even screams. The place is really magic. Beware of monkeys: I think, the total population is over a hundred there. Not that I have seen any of them behaving aggressively with humans but being surrounded by them moving to and fro so close is not a comfortable feeling. One more piece of advice is to see that temple from the seaside by kayaking: it feels absolutely cinematic and unreal.

Monkey mountain is no misnomer, there were indeed monkeys and plenty of them. It's quite a hill, so we took a taxi with Bolt up. The view is excellent at sunset and there are almost no tourists at this time either, but the temple was shut when we visited. We came for the view and monkeys and left very satisfied, taking a stroll down the hill to the restaurants at the foot of the hill serving fresh seafood.
Walkable distance from Hua Hin beach but could be tiring due to steep hill. Quiet but full of monkeys so be careful not to provoke or feed them. Parking is available but limited.

places.address: 123, 55 Nong Kae-Takiap, Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Duangkaew Cuisine, nestled in the heart of Hua Hin, is a charming eatery that captures the essence of authentic Thai flavors. With its warm hospitality and traditional decor, this restaurant offers a cozy ambiance perfect for enjoying classic dishes crafted from fresh, local ingredients. While it leans towards an upscale dining experience with elegant simplicity in presentation, Duangkaew also maintains reasonable prices for the quality provided. Guests can expect attentive service as staff expertly manage orders and ensure a pleasant dining experience.

sources.snippet: DuangKaew: DuangKaew is a quaint and cozy restaurant in Hua Hin, offering a taste of authentic Thai cuisine. Known for its warm hospitality and traditional Thai decor, the restaurant creates a homely and inviting atmosphere. It‚Äôs a great place to enjoy classic Thai dishes, prepared with fresh, local ingredients.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: Duangkaew Cuisine - ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏î‡∏ß‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏Å‡πâ‡∏ß

reviews.text:
We were  impressed by some of the dishes. Especially the grilled Italians toasted and the boneless chickens wings with honey and butter.

The ambiance was inviting and comfortable, making it perfect for a relaxing yet upscale meal.

The staff is very friendly, fast and attentive. We will be back asap.

The food was absolutely delicious, and the presentation was beautifully done. I can really feel the chef's attention to detail. I truly hope this restaurant becomes very popular. I'll definitely be coming back again next time!

Considered on the fancy end of huahin. All the dishes were tasty, especially snow fish very well made.

Except the wagyu steak was too chewy cut not worth the price.

places.address: 77110, Thailand, Prachuap Khiri Khan, Hua Hin District, Nong Kae, ‡∏ã‡∏≠‡∏¢ ‡∏´‡∏±‡∏ß‡∏ñ‡∏ô‡∏ô 23

places.generalDescription: Little Spain in Hua Hin is a charming restaurant and bar that offers an authentic Spanish experience. The menu features traditional dishes like tapas and paella, accompanied by a vibrant ambiance with lively music. Visitors can enjoy a delightful escape to Spain with carefully prepared authentic food, including favorites like patatas bravas and shishito peppers. The owner, Vanessa, adds a personal touch by chatting with guests about the menu and providing suggestions for an unforgettable dining experience.

sources.snippet: Little Spain: Little Spain is a charming slice of Spanish culture nestled in Hua Hin. This delightful restaurant and bar offers an authentic Spanish experience, with a menu brimming with traditional dishes like tapas and paella. Its vibrant ambiance, complete with lively music and a friendly vibe, makes it a perfect spot for an evening of fun and delicious Mediterranean cuisine.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

places.name: Little Spain

reviews.text:
Nice Spanish restaurant with freshly and quality food .
The atmosphere is very peaceful and great decorating.
Easy car  parking and sea view..
We highly recommend üëå

10/10!! We had such a great time, wonderful lunch there. Beachfront so, it has very nice view. We decided on the promotion of 5 tapas & a bottle of bubble. Great value and the food was delicious. Everything was so good. The seafood was fresh. The staff are friendly and nice. We'll definitely come back.

A Spaniard's odyssey in Hua Hin! First of all, the location next to the beach is breathtaking. It's an excellent choice of locale, as I can imagine how beautiful it gets during sunset. Although the Hua Hin side faces east, you can still catch a warm glow here and there.

Now then, we were very excited to dive into authentic pintxos and tapas crafted by a Thai chef trained by a Spaniard. The first few bites of the razor clam were bursting with umami like your papi, but the bouchot mussel quickly brought a pause: why was the meat so stringy? Ah, it was overcooked. Way too overcooked. Being imported and frozen, the tough texture was a result of both freezing and the cooking time.

The octopus tentacles were well-executed, and the padron peppers were a hit. However, the biggest disappointment was the Paella Negra. Despite the rave reviews from others, it was far from authentic. The rice texture was off, and it lacked the characteristic aroma of the broth and the unique taste of squid ink. A total miss, as it should have been the highlight of the dinner. Room for improvement across all dishes needed.

Kudos, however, to Annie and the rest of the service team, who were attentive and lovely throughout the evening.

places.address: 61, 13 Soi Nong Kae, Tambon Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Khao Takiab beach is a 270-meter-long stretch of sandy shoreline located just a 10-minute drive from the lively town of Hua Hin. The beach offers ample opportunities for swimming and sunbathing, and it is surrounded by various restaurants as well as temples. At the top of the road sits Khao Takiab hill, also known as Chopstick Hill, where visitors can escape the tourist crowds and unwind amidst lush hills and quaint temples.

sources.snippet: With just a 10 minute drive away from the vibrant town of Hua Hin, the 270 meters high Khao Takiab, meaning the Chopstick Hill, helps one escape the tourist trapping and unwind at a mountain sitting at the top of the road along with its permanent presiders, the monkeys. Atop the mountain is a Wat Khao Lad Temple, also known as the Monkey temple, due to the presence of many monkeys that reside there. A stairway leads visitors up the hill to witness the arresting view around and melt in the serenity of the calm, breezy temple.
sources.shortName: Top 21 BEST Things to do in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Khao Takiab is one of the nicest Hua Hin Beaches, offering sensational panoramic views of Hua Hin Thailand. This is a sleepy little fishing village just 10km from the main Hua Hin beaches. Kho Takiab Beach kind of reminds me of the relaxed beaches in Koh Lipe, Thailand.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

sources.snippet: Khao Takiab Beach is a stunning beach that is located just south of Hua Hin. The beach is known for its impressive rock formations, and it‚Äôs a great place for swimming and sunbathing. It‚Äôs also home to the Khao Takiab temple, which offers stunning views of the beach.
sources.siteName: M√∂venpick Asara Resort & Spa Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Best Things to do in Hua Hin 2025

sources.snippet: Another popular romantic activity is visiting the Khao Takiab viewpoint, which offers stunning panoramic views of the city and the Gulf of Thailand.
sources.shortName: Private Guided Tour In Romantic Places Of Hua Hin

places.name: Khao Takiab beach

reviews.text: Lovely sandy beach, very long. Buddha statue was cool

Not a great beach compared to phuket beaches,  water recedes along way so you ll have to walk  along way just to swim. Sand is a brown/Gray colour  and not  compelled to even get in the water .  Restaurants along the shore are good but not much open before 12 pm. Lucky to be 2 stars Not going back.

This beach is quiet and medium in size. There's a few restaurants with loungers and chairs. Also, there's plenty of empty areas to relax and chill on the beach. Jet ski rentals and banana boat rides available. The water was a little cloudy but still clear enough. Recommended

places.address: Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Nestled within the luxurious Hyatt Regency Hotel in Hua Hin, McFarland House is a culinary gem that has captured the hearts of both locals and travelers alike. Renowned for its exquisite brunch offerings, this seaside pavilion allows guests to savor fresh seafood, delectable pastries straight from the oven, hearty breakfast dishes, and local delicacies‚Äîall while soaking in breathtaking ocean views.

sources.snippet: McFarland House: Set in a restored 19th-century pavilion and part of the Hyatt Regency, McFarland House is a sophisticated caf√© and restaurant. It offers a blend of healthy, organic cuisine with a modern twist. The elegant setting, with its breezy, beachfront location, makes it a perfect choice for a more upscale lunch experience.
sources.shortName: The perfect Valentines in Hua Hin

sources.snippet: Once the night rolls in, you can indulge in a sundown cocktail and settle in for a romantic dinner by the ocean at McFarland House, Azure Bar, or Beach Society.
sources.shortName: 3 Romantic Activities in Hua Hin, Thailand

places.name: McFarland House

reviews.text:
Gorgeous setting.  The team were so accommodating and kind and not to mention attentive but without feeling rushed or hovering around.  The cocktail list was great especially the selections or gins and the curated and exquisite wine list.

I went for the rib eye which was prepared exactly how I like it.  The meal was exceptional and McFarland House is simply a must!  Not as expensive as one would think given its location and heritage.  Which in itself is breathtaking and serene.

I will be back time and time again.
The food was really delicious, I truly enjoyed it! Thank you for such a wonderful experience

This is my favourite spot so far. Have been for dinner and breakfast, perfect both times. Beautiful ingredients, food cooked with love and friendly staff. Gorgeous views of the Gulf and the house itself is very unique. I Will be back. Thank you.

places.address: 91 Hyatt Regency, Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Khao Tao is a tranquil coastal village in Thailand, known for its serene beaches and traditional fishing atmosphere. The area features the beautiful Sai Noi Beach, offering a more peaceful escape from the crowds. Visitors can also explore the Khao Tao Temple with stunning mountain views and the bay at Khao Tao (Turtle Hill) for lovely vistas over the Hua Hin coastline.

sources.snippet: Khao Tao Lake: A unique place to watch the sunset‚Äôs colors reflect over the lake. For the more adventurous, a walk up the mountain offers even more stunning views.
sources.siteName: Hua Hin Today - Your Premier Source for News, Reports, Events, and Information in Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Discover romantic sunset spots for Valentine's Day in Hua Hin - Hua Hin Today

places.name: Khao Tao

reviews.text: Just 15km from Hua Hin going South. You can wonder around the Reservoir or sample the street food down by the temple. Enter the temple along the fishing jetty and climb up to the large golden Buddha. You can get access to the beach by climbing the path over the rocks

Pretty unique set up for the temple. The view is amazing, the temple location is excellent. However, you can tell that it's not been well maintain which is not a bad thing. I only wish they built less ugly concert fake cave structures. Because the nature is so magnificent, it really doesn't need those ugly man made structures. However, the. Temple itself is absolutely beautiful. I also love the small fish village right by it.

Off DPT. Prachuap Khiri khan 2002 road, there's a small road up a hill¬†leading to Chao Mae Tuptim Thong Shrine, Racer Marina Hua hin and Pranburi Forest Park.¬† About halfway to the shrine, there's a shortcut with a sign reading "Pranburi Forest Park".¬† This small dirt road runs through a hilly jungle for a distance of about a couple of kilometers and ends near Bella Costa Hua Hin.¬† We decided to drive along it to get to the park.¬† It was all green all the way with brush and trees.¬† Surprisingly, we saw a peafowl and her 2 babies looking for food along it.¬† Then again, 2 more young peacocks and¬†a couple of peafowls foraging in the brush!¬† We have no idea how they are raised or wild ones, but it's a pleasant surprise to see them.

places.address: Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan, Thailand

places.generalDescription: If you're in Hua Hin and want to taste some of the best Thai cuisine, head to White Lotus Restaurant. With panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand and mountains in the background, this rooftop bar is a perfect place to enjoy a sunset while sipping on your cocktails. Open from 5:30pm until 11:30pm, it's definitely worth checking out!

sources.snippet: If you‚Äôre looking for a classy drink with your lover, overlooking the whole city of Hua Hin, definitely head to the White Lotus Skybar. We had the most romantic evening here at the Hilton Hua Hin‚Äôs rooftop bar on our Thailand honeymoon. They have an extensive range of cocktails with a few tropical Thai twists to them.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

places.name: White Lotus Restaurant

reviews.text: Thank you for your exceptional service and sumptuous food. We are so glad to celebrate our 12 year anniversary at your restaurant! Special call out to Som and all who served us and making our special day memorable. We will be back soon! :)

WHITE LOTUS BAR
I returned to the rooftop bar after a few years, the last time 2019 before Covid-19 time. Then I had been as a hotel customer, today simple walk in. There were only 8 people at 8pm and a boring ambiance, but prices increased, compared to 6 years before. I hope for them, that later, in the evening, things improve. However, I gladly go to the Chaad bar, swimming pool, it's the place for me

Visiting friends in hilton hotel so we came up to try this restaurant.
Nice cocktails. Portion is good amount to share.
Awesome service. Staff pay attention to every details and help us their best. And they speak good English.
Nice view from balcony, good place to have proper appointment with people.

places.address: 33 Naresdamri Rd, Hua Hin, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Hua Hin Fishing Pier is a unique spot that offers a stunning view of the sunset over the town, creating a captivating play of colors in the sky. During the day, it seems like a nice place for a leisurely stroll and some photos, but at night, it comes to life with food vendors offering barbecue, seafood, sushi, and drinks. The pier also serves as a fishing spot for locals starting from late afternoon.

sources.snippet: Hua Hin Fishing Pier: This unique spot offers a contrasting view of the sunset over the town, creating a captivating play of colors in the sky.
sources.siteName: Hua Hin Today - Your Premier Source for News, Reports, Events, and Information in Hua Hin
sources.shortName: Discover romantic sunset spots for Valentine's Day in Hua Hin - Hua Hin Today

places.name: Hua Hin Fishing Pier

reviews.text: A great place to enjoy the sea. You'll even find people fishing there. In the evening, a night market opens with a wide variety of affordable food options.

Thai street food, infinity view, windy, quiet, just a very chill spot. ‚ú®
(There is more of seating if you walk thru the end of the pier)

The Hua Hin Fishing Pier is a charming and serene spot, offering visitors a glimpse into the local fishing culture. It's a peaceful place where you can watch the boats come and go, and the view of the sea is simply beautiful, especially at sunrise. The pier also has a relaxed atmosphere, making it a great place to unwind and soak in the tranquil surroundings. It's a hidden gem in Hua Hin that offers both a sense of local life and natural beauty.

places.address: HXG6+892, Hua Hin, Thailand

places.generalDescription: Villa Baan Malinee is a perfect Hua Hin accommodation for couples looking for their own little oasis. Surrounded by temples and farms, the beach and city are not too far away. You can rent bikes, cars and motorbikes from this amazing place. The staff are super friendly and the place was really clean. It's reasonably priced and I would definitely recommend it!

sources.snippet: Villa Baan Malinee is one of the best Hua Hin accommodations for couples in search of their own little oasis on their Hua Hin honeymoon. You‚Äôre surrounded by temples and farm, however, the beach and the city aren‚Äôt too far away. You can rent motorbikes, bicycles and even a car from this awesome Hua hin accommodations.
sources.shortName: Hua Hin Honeymoon Guide

places.name: Villa Baan Malinee | Best Villa in Thailand

reviews.text: We really enjoyed staying at this villa, the breakfasts were varied and very tasty. We are very happy that we can live here with pets. The cat and dog were very happy and relaxed. Beautiful interior and garden with a large swimming pool is also very nice.

My wife and I have stayed in Villa Baan Malinee 3 times now; first time as a newlywed with our puppy, second time with my pregnant wife and older puppy, and most recent with our 7 month old baby and much older pup. All 3 times have been amazing! The staff are incredibly helpful and friendly the whole way through. Our most recent stay was the most memorable as Marlene was available throughout the day to accommodate us with our needs. She was able to provide us with a baby crib, baby highchair and provide baby friendly breakfasts (included). They even cooked vegan and vegetarian food for us as my wife is vegan and our baby and I are vegetarian. Upon our request, Marlene also organised a cute massage for my wife and I in the villa.

The rooms we've stayed in are spacious with very comfortable beds. The bathrooms are big and one of the rooms we stayed in had a bathtub and an outside shower. They clean the room upon request or from our experience, every other day. There is plenty of space to hang and keep your clothes. A mini fridge and minibar are available in the rooms we stayed in.

The outside space is blooming with nature and looks stunning. There is a big swimming pool and spa, with some pool toys available for use. There is an outside eating area accessible any time. There is a communal kitchen which is open from the morning until the early evenings where there is a microwave, toaster, oven, kettle, and more! There are heaps of information about attractions and places to eat in the lounge room and Marlene is very knowledgeable about things to do in Hua Hin if you need any further information. I cannot recommend this place enough ‚Äì do yourself a favour and enjoy this home away from home!

A wonderful oasis, where we were well looked after. Fabulous stay and would recommend it to anyone. Perfect for those who wants to be in Hua Hin, and don't feel the need for beachfront location. Thank you.

places.address: 66, 47 Soi Moo Baan Hua Na, Nong Kae, Hua Hin District, Prachuap Khiri Khan 77110, Thailand
